timeline.bodyText: Should we establish a better convention for image naming and the import names of them?
timeline.author: srambach

timeline.bodyText: I don't think we need the extra space before the colon (applies to all the TextListItems
timeline.author: srambach

timeline.bodyText: Should this say Management Console or Kogito? Or just avoid that decision and say "This open source software is released under the Apache Software License 2.0" ? @cristianonicolai do you know? Another possibility is to move this to the License Information line, put the link words as "Apache Software License 2.0" and then link to the license url.
timeline.author: srambach

replies.bodyText: @srambach  perhaps we could say: Management Console is part of Kogito, a open source software...
replies.author: cristianonicolai

replies.bodyText: I have added -Management Console is part of Kogito, an open source software released under the Apache Software License 2.0. wdyt?
replies.author: AjayJagan
